=======
Changes
=======


1.0.1 (2011-09-04)
-----------------

- Fixed bug when there are no log entries for the current interval (#9332).


1.0 (2011-07-01)
----------------

- Fixed bug with incomplete log file lines ("invalid literal for float(): -").


1.0rc1 (2011-06-10)
-------------------

* First release.
